code: import color from'color';import{black,white,pinkA400}from"./colors";import configureFonts from"./fonts";var DefaultTheme={dark:false,roundness:4,colors:{primary:'#6200ee',accent:'#03dac4',background:'#f6f6f6',surface:white,error:'#B00020',text:black,onSurface:'#000000',disabled:color(black).alpha(0.26).rgb().string(),placeholder:color(black).alpha(0.54).rgb().string(),backdrop:color(black).alpha(0.5).rgb().string(),notification:pinkA400},fonts:configureFonts(),animation:{scale:1.0}};export default DefaultTheme;
